document.heading: Real Property Tax Rate Act for Tax Year 1979

history.narrative: Law 2-138, the “Real Property Tax Rate Act for Tax Year 1979,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 2-369, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 3, 1978 and October 17, 1978, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 9, 1978, it was assigned Act No. 2-299 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
